BiqShajauq tAByA#mEqvAsmai# BEShaqjaM ka#rOqtIndra#sya prAqNO# &sItyA#hEndriqya- mEqvAsmi#nnEqtEna# dadhAti miqtrAvaru#NayOH prAqNO#&sItyA#ha prANApAqnAvEq- vAsmi#nnEqtEna# dadhAtiq viSvE#ShAM dEqvAnA$M prAqNO#&sItyA#ha 
vIqrya#mEqvAsmi#nnEqtEna# dadhAti GRuqtasyaq dhArA#maqmRuta#syaq panthAqmityA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitat pA#vamAqnEna# tvAq stOmEqnEtyA# - [  ]  43
